meanings.sent1: The hungry squirrel manducates the nuts with delight.
meanings.sent2: She manducates her breakfast slowly to savor the flavors.
meanings.sent3: The noisy parrot manducates its seeds with a cheerful chirp.
meanings.sent4: The old cow manducates the grass as if it were a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent5: The toddler manducates the banana, creating a sticky mess.

meanings.definition: a person who chews or eats food
meanings.sent1: The manducates at the picnic enjoyed the delicious sandwiches.
meanings.sent2: The manducates in the cafeteria chatted while eating lunch.
meanings.sent3: The manducates at the party were the first to try the new dish.
meanings.sent4: The manducates in the restaurant seemed to savor every bite.
meanings.sent5: The manducates in the family always had a hearty appetite.
